30500.name: The Potsdam Quick-Mart
description: {x
{R|  {mThe {MP{motsdam {CQ{Buick{CM{bart {x"{YO{ypen {C24 {BHours{x A Day, {R7 {BDays{x A Week"  {R|
You walk into a little store built in the middle of no where.
Outside, you see the forest that the Stardust Trailway goes through,
and to the south, you see the Sands Of Sorrow.  Inside you see the
shop is brightly lite and kept very clean.  Row after row of diffrent
merchandise all stacked and waiting to be bought.  A small dwarf sits
on a stool behind a large counter, reading a "Timber Maniacs"
Magazine.

30501.name: The {CWe{Bstbrid{Cge Qu{Bick-{CM{Bar{Ct{x
description: {x
{R|  {mThe {CWe{Bstbrid{Cge Qu{Bick-{CM{Bar{Ct {x"{YO{ypen {C24 {BHours {xA Day, {R7 {BDays{x A Week"  {R|{x
This is a small establishment that sits on the corner of Westbridge
Way and Coffin Street. Inside, there are big coolers in the back of the
shop, some lunch tables, a few rows of shelves stocked with junk food,
and a large counter with a magazine rack in the front. There is also
a coffee machine, and other drink machines.

30500.name: The Quick Mart Dwarf~
description:
A small dwarf sits behind a counter here, reading a "Timber Maniacs"
Magazine. The dwarf is surrounded by all kinds of merchandise.
subroutines:
